oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: I Need You Like A Hole In The Head - Webb Pierce performance - KWKH
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of I Need You Like A Hole In The Head, written by Tillman Franks, Shot Jackson, and Wayne Walker, and performed by Webb Pierce on a radio program. Webb Pierce advertises the Louisiana Hayride program that will be happening that night with appearances by Tillman Franks, Ramblin' Tommy Scott, Wilburn Family, Carolina Sunshine Girls [unconfirmed], Johnny Johnson [unconfirmed], Red Sovine and the Echo Valley Boys, Jimmy Lee, Bob Eaton [phonetic; unconfirmed], Buddy Attaway, Clayton McMichen, and the final performance from Slim Whitman. Broadcast is most likely from KWKH (Shreveport, La.).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Webb Pierce
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Webb Pierce advertises the Louisiana Hayride performance happening tonight [incomplete] / (1:04) Webb Pierce performs "I Need You Like A Hole In The Head" / (2:35) Webb Pierce introduces the next performance / (3:03) Webb Pierce performs "Beautiful Hawaiian Shores" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Franks, Tillman; Jackson, Shot; Walker, Wayne, 1925-1979; Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991; Louisiana hayride (Radio program); KWKH (Radio station : Shreveport, La.)
